channel.title: Connection Problems
channel.description:
Ok the places where I've put in my new No-Ip ip:
Source: Client.java server.java
Client: client.java Gui.java
Am I missing something??
I've portforwarded and I've made the port 43594 "Inbound Rules" exception on windows firewall exception.
I don't know what else to do..
Oh, I have noticed, whenever I try to run my server, the cmd always says "server is already in use" even though I know its not.
Help??? :confused: :confused:

item.title: Connection Problems

Am I missing something??
